title: Beyond Academic Excellence
shortDescription: Academic Excellence Book drawn from the experiences of Abraham Zhiri and I, Oluwatobi Akanji
description: Over the years, several Christian students have grappled with attaining academic excellence in their studies; however, academic excellence seems to elude them. In this book, we, Abraham Zhiri and I (Oluwatobi Akanji), chronicle how God has helped us on the journey to academic excellence and how we applied the lessons learnt in various spheres of our lives: walk with God, work, and relationships.

title: Stonks NFT Minter
description: The thought of Web3 and NFTs might have fascinated you and you want to get a quick feel. With StonksNFTMinter, you get to mint some stonks token as NFTs

title: ChartsCrypto
description: Have you ever wondered how lucrative investing in cryptocurrencies over the years might be? Sure, you can now simulate your desired portfolio to see how it fared over the years. Check out the Profit Net Loss (PNL) and check the trendlines.

title: Phallery
description: To celebrate Africa and showcase the continent to the world, captivating photographs does the trick. On this platform, photographers (hobbyists or professionals) upload photographs that shows the true story of the continent. Uploaded photos can be liked, loved, and commented on.

title: Personal Website
description: This is my personal portfolio website. It was created to help me reach out to people swiftly and get access to opportunities that come by.

title: WebBuddy
description: While browsing, there may be a need to copy a link, organize websites to surf, or make a quick to-do list; WebBuddy does all. It solves the need to take a quick note without opening another app: all is served in the browser.
